verses.verse: וּלְאַחְאָ֛ב <S%H256><s%> u-le-'ach-'Av And Ahab שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im had seventy בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim sons בְּשֹׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> be-sho-me-Ron; in Samaria וַיִּכְתֹּב֩ <S%H3789><s%> vai-yich-To wrote יֵה֨וּא <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu And Jehu סְפָרִ֜ים <S%H5612><s%> se-fa-Rim letters וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach and sent שֹׁמְר֗וֹן <S%H8111><s%> sho-me-Ron, to Samaria אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei unto the rulers יִזְרְעֶאל֙ <S%H3157><s%> yiz-re-'eL of Jezreel הַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <S%H2205><s%> haz-ze-ke-Nim, to the elders וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to הָאֹמְנִ֥ים <S%H539><s%> ha-'o-me-Nim and to them that brought up אַחְאָ֖ב <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av Ahab's לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. [children] saying

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, Now כְּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> ke-Vo cometh הַסֵּ֤פֶר <S%H5612><s%> has-Se-fer Now as soon as this letter הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem, about וְאִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> ve-'it-te-Chem for בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei sons אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-nei-Chem; to you seeing your master's וְאִתְּכֶם֙ <S%H854><s%> ve-'it-te-Chem for הָרֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> ha-Re-chev [are] with you and [there are] with you chariots וְהַסּוּסִ֔ים <S%H5483><s%> ve-has-su-Sim, and horses וְעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> ve-'Ir city מִבְצָ֖ר <S%H4013><s%> miv-Tzar a fenced וְהַנָּֽשֶׁק׃ <S%H5402><s%> ve-han-Na-shek. also and armour

וּרְאִיתֶ֞ם <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'i-Tem Look even out הַטּ֤וֹב <S%H2896><s%> hat-Tov the best וְהַיָּשָׁר֙ <S%H3477><s%> ve-hai-ya-Shar and meetest מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei sons אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-nei-Chem, of your master's וְשַׂמְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Tem and set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> kis-Se throne אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; [him] on his father's וְהִֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <S%H3898><s%> ve-hil-la-cha-Mu and fight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house אֲדֹנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-nei-Chem. for your master's

וַיִּֽרְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> vai-yir-'U afraid מְאֹ֣ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od greatly מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od, greatly וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and said הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei Behold two הַמְּלָכִ֔ים <S%H4428><s%> ham-me-la-Chim, kings לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not עָמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> 'a-me-Du stood לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav; not before וְאֵ֖יךְ <S%H349><s%> ve-'Eich how נַעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> na-'a-Mod him how then shall we stand אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Na-che-nu. we

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach [of the children] sent אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit And he that [was] over the house וַאֲשֶׁ֪ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הָעִ֟יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir and he that [was] over the city וְהַזְּקֵנִים֩ <S%H2205><s%> ve-haz-ze-ke-Nim the elders וְהָאֹמְנִ֨ים <S%H539><s%> ve-ha-'o-me-Nim also and the bringers up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יֵה֤וּא׀ <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu to Jehu לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha We [are] thy servants אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu, we וְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who תֹּאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> to-Mar all that thou shalt bid אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-nu to us נַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh; and will do לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- we will not נַמְלִ֣יךְ <S%H4427><s%> nam-Lich king אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, us we will not make any הַטּ֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> hat-Tov thou [that which is] good בְּעֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha in thine eyes עֲשֵֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Seh. do

וַיִּכְתֹּ֣ב <S%H3789><s%> vai-yich-To Then he wrote אֲלֵיהֶם֩ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem about סֵ֨פֶר׀ <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer a letter שֵׁנִ֜ית <S%H8145><s%> she-Nit the second time לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, to them saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If לִ֨י li אַתֶּ֜ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you וּלְקֹלִ֣י׀ <S%H6963><s%> u-le-ko-Li unto my voice אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem and you שֹׁמְעִ֗ים <S%H8085><s%> sho-me-'Im, If ye [be] mine and [if] ye will hearken קְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> ke-Chu take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רָאשֵׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei ye the heads אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei persons בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- sons אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-nei-Chem, your master's וּבֹ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> u-Vo-'u and come אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about כָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> ka-'Et this time מָחָ֖ר <S%H4279><s%> ma-Char by to morrow יִזְרְעֶ֑אלָה <S%H3157><s%> yiz-re-'E-lah; to me to Jezreel וּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei sons הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech Now the king's שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im [being] seventy אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, persons אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with גְּדֹלֵ֥י <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lei [were] with the great men הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of the city מְגַדְּלִ֥ים <S%H1431><s%> me-gad-de-Lim which brought them up אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam.

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, become כְּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> ke-Vo came הַסֵּ֙פֶר֙ <S%H5612><s%> has-Se-fer And it came to pass when the letter אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu to them that they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei sons הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, the king's וַֽיִּשְׁחֲט֖וּ <S%H7819><s%> vai-yish-cha-Tu and slew שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im seventy אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; persons וַיָּשִׂ֤ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> vai-ya-Si-mu and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רָֽאשֵׁיהֶם֙ <S%H7218><s%> ra-shei-Hem their heads בַּדּוּדִ֔ים <S%H1731><s%> bad-du-Dim, in baskets וַיִּשְׁלְח֥וּ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-le-Chu and sent אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to יִזְרְעֶֽאלָה׃ <S%H3157><s%> yiz-re-'E-lah. him [them] to Jezreel

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo And there came הַמַּלְאָךְ֙ <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'oCh a messenger וַיַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-ged- and told ל֣וֹ lo לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, him saying הֵבִ֖יאוּ <S%H935><s%> he-Vi-'u They have brought רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei the heads בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- sons הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech; of the king's וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And he said שִׂ֣ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> Si-mu Lay אֹתָ֞ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam שְׁנֵ֧י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei ye them in two צִבֻּרִ֛ים <S%H6652><s%> tzib-bu-Rim heaps פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach at the entering in הַשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar of the gate עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> hab-Bo-ker. until the morning

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> vab-Bo-ker And it came to pass in the morning וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze that he went out וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-Mod, and stood וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, to all the people צַדִּקִ֖ים <S%H6662><s%> tzad-di-Kim Ye [be] righteous אַתֶּ֑ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem; you הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold אֲנִ֜י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I קָשַׁ֤רְתִּי <S%H7194><s%> ka-Shar-ti behold I conspired עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against אֲדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni against my master וָאֶהְרְגֵ֔הוּ <S%H2026><s%> va-'eh-re-Ge-hu, and slew וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> u-Mi who הִכָּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kah him but who slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh. another

דְּע֣וּ <S%H3045><s%> de-'U Know אֵפ֗וֹא <S%H645><s%> e-Fo, now כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> lo nothing יִפֹּ֜ל <S%H5307><s%> yip-Pol that there shall fall מִדְּבַ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> mid-de-Var nothing of the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah, unto the earth אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit concerning the house אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av; of Ahab וַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah, hath done אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what דִּבֶּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber, [that] which he spake בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad by עַבְדּ֥וֹ <S%H5650><s%> av-Do his servant אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Ya-hu. Elijah

וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach slew יֵה֗וּא <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu, So Jehu אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֤ים <S%H7604><s%> han-nish-'a-Rim all that remained לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> le-veit- of the house אַחְאָב֙ <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av of Ahab בְּיִזְרְעֶ֔אל <S%H3157><s%> be-yiz-re-'El, in Jezreel וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all גְּדֹלָ֖יו <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lav and all his great men וּמְיֻדָּעָ֣יו <S%H3045><s%> u-me-yud-da-'Av and his kinsfolks וְכֹהֲנָ֑יו <S%H3548><s%> ve-cho-ha-Nav; and his priests עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until בִּלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> bil-Ti without הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <S%H7604><s%> hish-'ir- until he left ל֖וֹ lo שָׂרִֽיד׃ <S%H8300><s%> sa-Rid. him none remaining

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom And he arose וַיָּבֹ֔א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo, and departed וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech and went שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> sho-me-Ron; to Samaria ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- court עֵ֥קֶד <S%H7462><s%> 'E-ked [And] as he [was] at the shearing הָרֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> ha-ro-'Im of the shepherds בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> bad-Da-rech. in the way
